H0.text: Minyan is a quorum of ten adult males required for public worship in. Islamic

H1.text: Minyan is a quorum of ten adult males required for public worship in. Sikh

H2.text: Minyan is a quorum of ten adult males required for public worship in. Hindu

H3.text: Minyan is a quorum of ten adult males required for public worship in. Judeo

A4.text: In Judaism, a minyan is the quorum of ten Jewish adults required for certain religious obligations.

A5.text: The most common activity requiring a minyan is public prayer.
